location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Andrew Ramsay, Robert Sparks, David Carnegie, at Bombay Castle (Commercial Department), to Charles Watkins, East India Company Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter discusses the strategy of transferring woollens from Bushire to Basra according to the demands of the market and the need to send Carmenia [Kirmān] wool to India.Included is a copy of a letter from Bombay to Jaffier Khan [Ja‘far Khan Zand], dated 3 May 1788. It gives an account of Sheikh Nāsir's refusal to provide a pilot for an English vessel and requests that the Sheikh's conduct be looked into.
